LanguageData.GlitBed.label: Robotic beds
LanguageData.GlitBed.description: Beds with simple computers inside. Increases wound healing speed better than herbal ones.
LanguageData.CyberBed.label: Cybernetic beds
LanguageData.CyberBed.description: Beds with powerful cores inside. Greatly increases wound healing speed, immunity gain speed and treatment quality.
LanguageData.DevBed.label: Animal Devilbeds
LanguageData.DevBed.description: Research unlocks advanced animal medical beds, that use luciferium mechanites. These beds significantly increase animal rest effectiveness and healing speed.
